name: Cafe role game
description:
Role-playing business game Cafe

Both children and adults can play this game. After all, the lessons of doing business can be obtained from childhood.

Rules of the game:

• You need to bring food to the visitors of the cafe in time;
• you need to clean up the used dishes in time;
• You need to buy food in the store on time and prepare food;
• you need to extinguish the fire, if required;
• fight with mice if necessary;
• You need to clean up, if necessary.
